foods.name: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
foods.description: A savory Japanese-inspired bowl featuring grilled chicken glazed with sweet teriyaki sauce, served over steamed rice and mixed vegetables.

foods.name: General Tso's Chicken
foods.description: A popular Chinese-American dish featuring crispy fried chicken pieces coated in a tangy, sweet, and spicy sauce.

foods.name: Steamed Pork Dumplings
foods.description: Tender dumplings filled with seasoned ground pork, cabbage, and scallions, steamed to perfection and served with soy dipping sauce.

foods.name: Shrimp Tempura Sushi
foods.description: Crispy shrimp tempura rolled with rice, seaweed, and avocado, topped with a drizzle of eel sauce for a perfect crunch and flavor balance.
